pages.text: Sapata akasara arau yi raatita atmaprakasa karae
arau kihe tomaka janaba ye, ‘raatita yiye atmaprakasa karae’ seya no ki
(seya haiche) ujjbala naksatra
Pratyeka jirara oparate'i tattbabadhayaka ache
Eteke manuhe cinta karaa ucita ye, taka kiherae srsti karaa haiche
taka srsti karaa haiche drautagatita nirgata horaa panirae
yito nirgata haya meraudanda arau bukura majara paraa
Niscaya te'om taka ubhata'i anibalai saksama
Yidina gopana bisayasamuha paraiksa karaa ha’ba
se'idina tara kono sakti nathakiba arau kono sahayakarai'o nathakiba
Sapata akasara yiye barasuna dharana karae
sapata prthiraira, yito bidirna haya
niscaya e'ito (ala-kora'ana) mimansakarai bani
Arau e'ito nirarthaka nahaya
Niscaya sihamta bhisana sarayantra karae
arau mayo bhisana kausala karaicho
Eteke kaphirasakalaka arakasa diya; sihamtaka kichu samayara babe arakasa diya
Tumi tomara sumahana pratipalakara namara paraitrata arau mahima ghosana karaa
yijane srsti karaiche, tara pichata suthama karaiche
Arau yijane (bhagya) nirdharana karaiche tara pichata satpatha pradarsana karaiche
arau yijane trna-lata utpanna karaiche
tara pichata se'iboraka ka'la abarjanata parainata karaiche
Anatipalame ami tomaka patha karaama, phalata tumi napaharaiba
kerala allahe yi bicarae tara bahirae. Niscaya te'om prakasya arau aprakasya sakalo jane
Arau ami tomara babe sahaja patha sugama karai dima
Eteke upadesa diya, yadi upadesa phalaprasu haya
upadesa siye'i grahana karaiba yiye bhaya karae
Arau yi hatabhagya si iyaka agraahya karaiba
si bhayabaha ju'ita praraesa karaiba
Tara pichata si tata mrtyubarano karaiba noraaraiba arau jiraita'o thakiba noraaraiba
Niscaya saphalata labha karaiba yiye atmasud'dhi karaiba
Arau tara pratipalakara nama smarana karaiba arau chalata adaya karaiba
